author: jstrachan
msg: a bunch of changes after a very productive plane journey; now we've got a <beans> tag that you can nest in your <foo b:id="whatnot"/> tags which seems to work. We also dynamically resolve classes as we parse, using a similar technique to xbean-spring using META-INF/services. Also I've added test cases for using references or for using inheritence
